snippet.title: Mars Attracts Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Exclusive new gameplay from Mars Attracts, the first officially licenced game of Mars Attacks, in which you abduct humans from history and use them to build a Martian theme park. Debuted as part of the Convergence showcase. 

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760580

#convergenceshow #indiegame #ackackackack #marsattacks
